name: magi basic
matches: ^(\w+) calls upon .+ and unleashes a forceful blow at your .+ with \w+ staff\.$
^With efficient, precise motions a crystalline golem latches onto your .+, before giving a vicious twist\.$
The element of earth shakes you to the core
You scream in pain as the forest of sharpened crystals pierces your body.
A gust of wind strikes you, throwing you to the ground.
^As a crystalline golem begins to pulse with a strange inner glow, you feel suddenly sluggish and unsteady\.$
Waves of elemental water surge over your body, chilling you to the bone.
